text:
Hotel Grand Pasundan (GP) bukanlah hotel asing bagi saya tapi salah satu prioritas pilihan jika kekota Bandung. Secara umum fasilitas yang ada sudah baik, kenyamanan, ketenangan dan keamanan juga telah dimiliki oleh GP. Namun, ada beberapa hal kecil yang mungkin masih dapat dipertimbangkan untuk perbaikan, antara lain :
1. Gantungan baju di lemari. Dari segi jumlah sdh cukup namun karena gantungan baju menyatu dengan lemari maka untuk menggantung baju yang dipersiapkan untuk aktivitas esok hari akan mengalami kesulitan, sehingga urung dilakukan alias kembali kedalam tas.
2. Fasilitas Taxi. Sarana taxi yang tersedia kurang profesional, baik dari kondisi kendaraan, pengemudi maupun argo. Sedangkan untuk menentukan pilihan taxi yang lebih baik tidak dapat dilakukan karena kesepakatan kerjasama yang telah dilaksanakan antara GP dengan perusahaan taxi. Sehingga jika kita menumpang taxi dari hotel GP akan menaiki kendaraan yang kotor luar dalam, AC yang belum tentu hidup, pengemudi yang tidak rapih dan pembayaran yang ditentukan oleh pengemudi dengan berbagai alasan.....argo rusak....dikira hanya jarak dekat....orang susah (tapi galak)....dll
3. Fasilitas karaoke. Pada umumnya sudah baik hanya perlu dipertimbangkan kembali untuk meningkatkan kualitas sound dan mic.
Terima kasih, semoga bermanfaat.
title: Kecil tapi harus dipertimbangkan

text: my partner booked this hotel for me. i came to this hotel at 10.30 PM, and i go straight to the lobby.. before i came to the hotel, i didnt check all the review, i just saw the over all review which is got 4,2 score out of 5.. i think its good.. so after i checked in, the receptionist gave me the key and said my room was on the other building, i walked out of the main building to the in front building which is the spa building if im not mistaken.. i already felt suspicious by that, i even strugling to find the elevator to the room, not a good sign.. and finally i came to the room, and holyf.. that was the worst room ive been. i paid for Rp 400-ish for the worst room. everything is seems so old, the bathroom? super disgusting, they even put the towel on the floor, yuck! the bed? it so rickety, well its just like a hostel room, not even a hotel, moreover its 4 star hotel! and the ac is not working, i called the room service to fix it but i waited for 10 minuted they still not coming.. i felt they ripped me and lied to me, let tell u something, u could definitely find a great 3 star hotel for Rp 300ish and the room its much much better than that.. since i cant stand the room, i called the receptionist and asked them to move to the main building, and they said i have to paid extra Rp 150.000 to move. because the room is just unbearable, i paid and i moved.. shame on u guys, why u didnt told us that the 400ish room isnt a 4 star hotel room?! so disappointed.
title: OMYGOD!!!

text:
Guess I am new to Java. 3 mosques woke me daily about 4.30am. All good as 2 only continue for 15 minutes. 1 dribbles on till 6am. At 6.30am a school starts on the loudspeaker. My advice - go to bed early, drunk, and with earplugs 😂😂

No alcohol across most of Bandung except a couple of streets in the city.

Hotel room was backpacker in the old section at the front. Cheap but user friendly. Free wifi around the hotel. Excellent breakfast if included.

Staff are helpful and friendly.
title: Mosque Ow

text: Just make sure that you get room in the main building! I got room in the old one. It’s dirty particularly the bathroom and towel (regret that I didn’t bring my own), no glass to put your tootbrush, the bathtub had mildew, no window, and the plug didn’t work well.
title: 4 stars hotel?? Really??

text:
I travel often but never review hotels, but i feel compelled to write about this hotel. First of all you go into the nice lobby of the hotel, and you think this looks pretty good, you check in, then they take you to this other hotel round the corner 50 metres away. This has been mentioned a few times by previous visitors. This other hotel block they take you to is not even close to 4 stars in looks or service. i cant really comment on the rooms in the main building, altogether this is just false advertising in my eyes as the second building is a major downgrade. Its wrong.

Towels are rough and have a smell to them, Bathtub looks filthy, the smell of damp/must feels the corridors and rooms. Was only offered a coffee on 1 morning of the 3 mornings i stayed here, despite there being plenty of staff around in the breakfast area not doing nothing. I think the staff may mean well, as when they do help i get the impression they do care, but maybe they need to be trained to be more attentive to guests. Its not the level of a 4 star and this was in the main building.  The food is ok. some of the meals are actually pretty good, breakfast is ok

Going back to the rooms again, the walls are in dire need of a paint job, just filthy and unsightly, dont understand the thought process of the management who run this place.

Maybe there is not much competition in the area for them to bother making improvements. But i stayed 3 days and was happy to leave, now im at hotel88 and so far its a far better experience, Grand Pasundan need to make a lot of improvements otherwise they will just lose business, it has potential to be a good hotel but they need to sort out the smells/stenches in the old building wherever you go it has a bad odour and get some soft towels. Also looking out my window, it would be good to clean up all the cigarette butts that are lined up outside the window some looks months if not years old, just a BAD experience all round, i doubt the management even have the common sense to see the issues let alone fix them

I would definitely not stay here again
title: NOT GOOD

text: i have to worship in this place.. christmas eve at this hotel...the ballroom its large room..and have good interior..very simple decoration and clean...have a good service,, i have enjoy at this place..
title: Have worship place

text:
The only reason we stayed at this hotel was to attend an event which was held at this hotel.
Basement parking area was small. Luckily we found a parking spot outside. The hotel provided free parking. Free welcome drink (sweet tea) at the lobby.

We stayed one night at the Deluxe Room. I requested for non-smoking room, but the room was full. We got sanitized smoking room instead (no smoke smell in the room, so I had no complaints concerning odor). The furniture was outdated, room was clean, but not bright enough for convenient reading. Room was not soundproof, we can hear noise from outside and indoor. The air conditioner sound was loud. The safe deposit box could not be opened, and the hotel staff replaced it with newer version. The maintenance operator and technical staff provided good service and prompt response. Bed was not comfortable for me, but my husband managed to sleep.
The toilet was clean and bright, amenities were standard, the towels were fragrant and clean, but a bit outdated.

Massage area was being renovated and looked messy. Toilet in the massage area was not convenient to use. The massage staff smoked in the massage area. The therapists were all contractual-based, and it may be the cause why there was no equal quality standard between my husband's therapist and mine. The massage head holder was smelly (I asked my therapy to cover the head holder with towel to reduce the smell). I was not satisfied with the massage service and ambience.

The ballroom was huge, decoration was okay, chandeliers were white color, walls and carpet were a bit outdated. There were various food served at the event, but overall the food tasted just average.
Breakfast served continental and western food. Not too many variety to choose, taste was also average.
title: It's not a 4-star hotel as the hotel claimed

text:
I didn't stay in the room of this hotel, and use the ballroom to give the seminar instead. So I can not say anything about the room.  But I surely can comment on the ballroom and the food they served.

The ballroom is huge and consider good to held big seminar. The lighting was good and the resonance of the sound system in the room was also good.  The food was consider under my expectation, since I was expecting something better because it is the 4 star hotel.  May be for the room service is better, I really don't know.

The location is OK, though it is not in the heart of Bandung city, but it is very close to the one of the toll gate of Kopo when you chose to exit from the toll way if you are traveling by car from Jakarta or neighboring cities.
title: The ballroom is good, but the food was not as I was expected.

text: The rooms in the old part, are a disgrace. Dirty tapestry in hallways and rooms, outdated bathrooms, in our rooms was raining inside trough the closed window. The new part little better, but overall: this hotel is not worth it's price nor stars. Breakfast nothing special and sometimes, they add the leftovers of the buffet of previous evening. Enough good hotels in Bandung. Advice: stay out of this one
title: Not worth it

text:
I think the rating for this hotel not right, because the hotel facility not suitable for 4 stars hotel, the hotel corridor not enough light but the food not to bad. You have to pay parking fee even you stay at this hotel and the parking lot not good enough for 4 stars hotel.
I think in 4 stars hotel usually we got newspaper but in this hotel you will not get it.
This hotel has 2 different building so if you want to stay in this hotel, you better ask first where the room you will stay in, because the first one is the old building.
title: Not too good hotel

text:
I stayed here on business trip early June 2014. Location is not in the middle of tourist attractions, the reason I chose this hotel as simply due to its close proximity to my meeting place.

Hotel itself (room, facilities, ambiance) really is a 4-star, but to me the service quality does not deserve 4-star rating:
1. Minor glitch during check-in as I had to wait 30 minutes for the room to be prepared (despite I checked in at 5 PM). I was sure to be booked a twin bed room, but was assigned a king bedroom instead. I asked for a room change, and after 30 minutes was given the room change. Reservation Staff needs to pay more attention to booking requests, good point from the male Front Desk Staff who was patient when explaining things so the guest is informed and not end up angrier.

2. The wait staff during breakfast were slow and not attentive. When the food trays got empty, they did not replenish quickly. However the food itself tasted nice with enough selection.

Actually within 10 minutes driving you can find Harris Festival Citylink, which offers integration with shopping mall. If Grand Pasundan does not improve its service quality, then I will choose Harris instead and do not recommend this hotel.
title: Good hotel, not-so-good service quality

text:
We booked 3 rooms and it was a nice and cozy stay, no problem with me brought a baby. The breakfast is super, lots of variations and all are delicious.

The surroundings are not very exciting like in the central city area but nice for people stay there for business reason or else.
title: Nice and cozy

text: The room rate offered was worth every penny. We stayed there for five nights and everyone in our group enjoyed the excellent services rendered to us. Here I would like to mention regarding three housekeeping staff honesty. I forgot and left Rp2.2 million on the table in the room and we went out shopping, i only realised that I left the money on the table when I return to the room late at night. The staff put an ashtray on top of the money to keep it from blown away. I was really touch and had the opportunity to meet the three honest young people. All their staff were friendly and well mannered and always smiling. The rooms and bathroom are clean and we can sleep soundly every night. We did not have any untoward experience but only happy memories. We will return if the room rate remains the same.
title: Worth every penny

Breakfast is average, just giving my suggestion to have traditional JAMU, herb healthy drink for this will be an added value for guest/ customer to enjoy the old fashioned environment interior like angklung that is placed in Lobby as the centre of attraction.

Ciwidey has a lot of very attractive nature scenery like:  kawah putih, situpatenggang lake, and not to forget having lunch at Sawung Gawir.
title: GOOD LOCATION WHEN VISIT SOUTH PART OF BANDUNG CIWIDEY

text: Was on my business trip last week. It's amazing me because of the clean and tidy room. I like their yummy breakfast especially.   I personally feel that it is excellent in such a developing city. Keep it up !
title: Excellent !

text:
the hotel is good for group, lots rooms with huge meeting room. there is swimming pool and fitness centre. 

they have spa service here, but i got no time to try. bfast was ok, they serve many kinds of choice here

the bad thing is the location, located at not tourist area. however there is a new shopping mall nearby
title: good hotel for group

text:
I stayed in this hotel 3 times. the price is good, the service is moderate.
 i stayed overnight so  i did not mind they provided old tv set in my room, not-so clean table (ants everywhere), etc. What upset me is the attitude of people at the front desk. Two out of three times I checked in, they always said, the room was not ready yet. I had made reservation before, and they always said the check in time was 13.00. But, even I came at or around 13.00, they did not have room yet for me. The fourth time I was there, at the front desk, the girl was so dumb that she even could not explain to me what she would do as the room was not ready yet (she mumbled several times: 'what should i do?') and how long i should wait. she asked me to sit in the lobby, fine, but how long? one?two? three-hour of waiting? come on! somebody should had told me. as a comparison, other hotels (which are better than this bloody one) have policy, if the room they promise is not ready, the guest will have an upgrade or whatever to accomode him/her.
at the end, i called a taxi and walked out to find another hotel. i promised myself, i will never stay at grand pasundan again!
title: very unprofessional

owner_response.text:
Dear simbahputri,

Warmest greetings from Grand Pasundan Convention Hotel,

Thank you for your review about our hotel and we would like to apology to you. Please kindly let us explain about the situation back then when you were staying at our hotel. We acknowledged that in 2009 we had many shortcomings, especially in the services our staff provided to hotel guests. We have made all these shortcomings as lessons to improve our hotel services. Therefore, once again we extend our deepest apologies and of course we hope you are willing to visit our hotel again to feel the changes we have made in providing the best service for all our guests. We gladly look forward to your visit. Thank you for your attention.

Best regards,

Fery Ferdiansyah
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: All'ingresso nella hall sembra un ottimo hotel, poi ci hanno portato in delle camere esterne all'hotel stesso (si accede passando da fuori). Camere sporche, senza phon, con lo scarico che funziona male e la wifi anche peggio. Il ristorante non ha prodotti freschi ne a colazione ne a cena. Inoltre abbiamo pagato al check in e al check out ci hanno richiesto i soldi, abbiamo dovuto far vedere la ricevuta di pagamento che fortunatamente abbiamo tenuto. Esperienza pessima!
title: Sconsigliato
